title: Hey babe
creator_credit: Rafal Zielinski, Arthur Voronka, Institut Quebecois, Canadian Film Development Corporation and Rafal Productions
brief_description: Starstruck 12-year-old Theresa (Yasmine Bleeth), a streetwise orphan, is determined to find fame and success in the show-business industry but it is not until she meets up with Buddy (Buddy Hackett), an aging vaudeville performer, that her dream finally becomes reality. Cast also includes Marushka Stankova, Vlasta Vrana, Denise Proulx.
